page.title: 08Residents Survey
page.content:
We interviewed{ 375} people,{166}male and{ 209 }female, of all ages.
Reasons people{ LIKED }the area: {1 People are friendly........199 (53%) 2 Good shops.................145 (39%) {2 Easily get to town centre..145 (39%) 4 Family / friends in area...141 (38%) {5 Good bus service........... 92 (26%) 6 Enough parks / open space.. 73 (19%) {7 Good housing............... 40 (11%) 8 A lack of vandalism........ 11 ( 3%)
Reasons people{DISLIKED}the area: {1 Too much vandalism.........192 (51%) 2 Too much litter............180 (48%) {3 High crime rate............145 (39%) 4 Dangerous roads............133 (35%) {5 Poor housing............... 73 (19%) 6 Too noisy.................. 48 (13%) {7 Lack of parks / open space. 31 ( 8%) 8 Unfriendly people.......... 21 ( 6%)
